content: 2 skip 2 sts double_crochet in next st* around chain 2 slip_stitch into 3rd ​ chain of previous round top edge and handles round 33 chain 1 place 2 single_crochet into chain space *skip next st make 2 single_crochet into chain space* around slip_stitch into first single_crochet ​ from previous round 74 sts round 34-35 chain 1 skip next st single_crochet into ea st around slip_stitch into first single_crochet from previous round 74 sts ​ round 36 note during the chain portion of this row take care not to twist the chain before ​ ​ reattaching it to the top of the bag chain 1 skip next st single_crochet into ea of next 7 sts chain 70 skip next 21 sts ​ single_crochet into ea of next 16 sts chain 70 skip next 21 sts single_crochet into ea of next 8 sts slip_stitch into first single_crochet from previous round 172 sts rnds 37-38 chain 1 skip next st single_crochet in all sts around ​ finishing using a tapestry needle weave in all ends pattern written in 2017 by jenn fox for ​mushrump com​ this pattern may not be reproduced or copied without written permission of the author
